statements: UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET email_address='example1@example.com', first_name='John' WHERE subscriber_id=1;
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET last_name='Doe', email_address='example2@example.com' WHERE subscriber_id=2;
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE subscriber_id = 12345;
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET interaction_history = '{"last_interaction": "2022-01-15", "total_interactions": 25}' WHERE subscriber_id = 54321;
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_timestamp = now() WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE subscriber_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE subscriber_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email Click' WHERE subscriber_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321'
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', subscription_date='2022-10-01' WHERE subscriber_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET preference_name='Theme', preference_value='Dark' WHERE subscriber_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'Alice' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Click', interaction_data = '{"button": "submit"}' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET preference_value = 'weekly' WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND preference_key = 'email_frequency';
UPDATE subscribers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE subscriber_preferences SET preference_value = 'true' WHERE preference_key = 'email_notifications';
